meanings.definition: A person who governs or controls.
meanings.sent1: The governors of the school make important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The governors of the country meet to discuss new laws.
meanings.sent3: The governors of the playground decided to ban tag during recess.
meanings.sent4: In the game of chess, the queen acts as the governor of the board.
meanings.sent5: The governors of the company ensure everything runs smoothly.

meanings.definition: A device that regulates or controls the speed or power of a machine.
meanings.sent1: The small engine had a reliable governor to maintain its speed.
meanings.sent2: The governor on the treadmill helps prevent you from running too fast.
meanings.sent3: The governor on the toy car made sure it didn't crash into walls.
meanings.sent4: The windmill's governor adjusted the rotation speed according to the wind.
meanings.sent5: The governor on the fan kept the room cool without being too noisy.

meanings.definition: The head of a state or territory.
meanings.sent1: The governor of the state gave a speech about upcoming changes.
meanings.sent2: The governors of different states gathered for a conference.
meanings.sent3: The governor of the land of toys was a teddy bear.
meanings.sent4: The governor of the island ensured the safety of all residents.
meanings.sent5: The wise governor of the kingdom was respected by all.
